attributes.title: Awful.
attributes.review: POV: You open the app to see a Cheeto on the front page as it asks for your number. You immediately remember the TikTok video and go back to the App Store to write a review.

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app my balls retracted back into my stomach and I turned into a women which is good because trump hates trans people I hope that fascist sees all these reviews and stops running for president

attributes.title: Very Bad.....
attributes.review: Got the app. Love Trump. But it keeps crashing and I can’t understand anything. Especially because English is not my first language. Needs huge changes.

attributes.title: Black lives matter
attributes.review: This app took to long too download it kept on crashing my phone it kept kicking Me out the app

attributes.title: Just so so bad
attributes.review: This app keeps glitching and messing up my phone. Notifications don’t work what to ever either. Overall just a really bad app

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: I really don’t like his plans that he is doing and I feel like there should be more to this app where it should show what he is doing and why

attributes.title: Hated it
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and I have to put in my phone number it’s just so they can see your texts and calls which is not ok I hated this app

attributes.title: a danger to society😔
attributes.review: this app ruined my phone bro. i got it and the app kept CRASHING😤 and eventually it wiped all the data off my phone. you tried🧚‍♀️✨never try again💗🌸🥰

attributes.title: TEHE
attributes.review: I opened this app to see a horrifying racist Cheeto. Never in my life did i think Cheetos could be so racist, homophobic, and just flat out disgusting. I will now be switching to Doritos🧚🏻‍♀️🌸 I hope all you Cheetos lovers can understand❤️❤️

attributes.title: absolutely disgusting
attributes.review: this app is HORRIBLE. FIRST when i downloaded it donald trump came INTO my room AND THEN he tried to get me to EAT a TRUMP 2020 FLAG. I COULD OF CHOKED ARE YOU SERIOUS WITH THAT. then he disappeared and the smell in my room was HORRENDOUS. (kinda like old toenail clippings) (or the back of a newly pierced ear) disgusting!!
